name: Forward: Escape the Fold
description: I'm Christophe Coyard, the solo-developer of FORWARD: Escape the Fold and I previously worked on various small mobile games with the aim of developing my game design skills. Driven by passion, I built this game from scratch for the 7DRL 2019 GameJam and I since then worked hard to develop the ultimate bitesized roguelike game.You can follow me on Twitter @twotinydice !
